data.title: Methodist Church. Aliwal North and Burgersdorp Circuit.
data.text:
Part of the Methodist Archives Collection. 9,35m. MS & Typescript. Card Catalogue.

(During the period before 1932 this Circuit formed part of the Primitive Methodist Church, after that date it formed part of the Methodist Church of SA).

-- Records: (1) Circuit records: Quarterly Meeting minutes (1873-1951); account books including detailed records for Butts Location, Aliwal North with rents, occupiers, state of housing (1911-1930). (2) Christ Church, Aliwal North records: committee minutes, trustees minutes (1875-1932). (3) Coloured Church records: leaders meeting minutes (1925-1942). (4) Letter book by Rev. George Ayre describing his work in the Circuit and on the Witwatersrand. (1910-1915).
